duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and monitor machinery, ensuring the quality of finished workpieces according to specifications.
Utilize manual tools for deburring, cutting, and polishing of workpieces.
Handle heavy parts using bridge cranes and jib cranes, and operate forklifts for material and part movement.
Complete accurate certification reports and comply with safety procedures and policies.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED (Technical certifications or machinery operation training preferred)
